TITLE: U.S. to require negative Covid test for travelers from China as virus spreads
SUMMARY: The new policy comes amid a surge in Covid cases in China and as fears of a new variant emerge

TITLE: Novak Djokovic says there are no hard feelings over deportation as he returns for Australian Open
SUMMARY: Djokovic has won the Australian Open a record nine times, including the last three times he played. Rafael Nadal won the 2022 title in Djokovic’s absence

TITLE: Risk of a dangerous new Covid variant in China is ‘quite low,’ U.S. health expert says
SUMMARY: No new Covid variant has emerged despite perhaps billions of omicron infections worldwide this year, said Dr. Chris Murray of the University of Washington

TITLE: Promising new Covid pill shows key advantages over Paxlovid in trial
SUMMARY: A Chinese antiviral pill was found to be as effective as Paxlovid in a Phase 3 trial, and it appeared to cause fewer side effects

TITLE: Wuhan is once again besieged by Covid — three years after it recorded the world's first cases
SUMMARY: “Everyone has accepted it quite openly,” said one resident of Wuhan, where coronavirus cases have exploded. “People are just desperate to move in a good direction now

TITLE: Flu and RSV on the decline but Covid hospitalizations rise
SUMMARY: Holiday gatherings and travel, however, could send flu activity up again, experts caution

TITLE: What is the XBB.1.5 subvariant? CDC reports a new strain of omicron taking over in the U.S.
SUMMARY: About 40% of confirmed U.S. Covid cases are caused by the XBB.1.5 strain, up from 20% a week ago

TITLE: Hong Kong to resume hamster imports a year after mass cull over Covid
SUMMARY: Officials in the Chinese territory had been criticized over their response to an outbreak of the delta variant that was traced to a pet shop
